sequence_0.text: This this the starting point of the story.

sequence_1.text: With pleasure! Narra is a system designed for interactive stories, told through your web browser.

sequence_2.text: Well, are you sure you don't want to learn more about this system?

sequence_3.text: It takes the form of a javascript library, and the story it reads are written in JSON format.

sequence_4.text: I sense some hardly contained anger within you... Communication could be of great help, you know.
